data.name: UpdateFile
data.description: Updates the content of a file at the specified path. This function allows you to modify existing files with new content.
data.function: codebolt.fs.updateFile(filename: string, filePath: string, newContent: string)
data.input_variable_description: The filename parameter specifies the file name, filePath specifies the directory path, and newContent contains the replacement content.
data.raw_content: Updates the content of a file at the specified path by replacing existing content with new content.
